main.name: Enver Rahman
main.occupation: Undergraduate student at the University of Maryland, College Park. Studying computer science, with a passion for design
main.bio: Welcome to my website! I am a student at the University of Maryland, studying computer science. In my free time I enjoy streaming League of Legends where I educate fellow gamers on how to properly play the game.I also enjoy creating graphics which you can find below.

education.description: Pursuing Bachelors of Science in Computer Science

work.title: Research and Data Analyst
work.description: Conducted research on numerous companies, organizations and employee profiles for their product database.

work.title: Research Intern
work.description: Collected and reviewed analytic data on local companies and individual profiles.

work.title: Consultant
work.description: Created Marketing and advertisement designs for small online businesses using Adobe Master Suite.

work.title: Founder
work.description: Custom computer building service and self run tech repair service for computer hardware, software and phones.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
